overview: (Adel) the lawyer learns that there is a treasure buried in the wall of an old villa by means of a map he saw in a book he bought from Rupabiquia, and in the villa, an old woman lives with her arrogant brother and their maid. So the lawyer goes to them, wanting to work as a driver for them, to search for the buried treasure, which leads to him in many comical situations.
title: only five (play)
